root: ^'L for lobby' you think. Makes sense.

L1: ^and into what appears to be an abandoned ground floor of some sort. You recognize it as the lobby for Exodus’s headquarters. You remember walking through here for your first day orientation. But the lobby doesn’t look exactly the same as it did on your first day. Papers are strewn everywhere and glass is broken. The once busy and bustling room is now cold and quiet. An old curtain flaps noisily in the wind hissing through a shattered window. “What happened here?”
